channel.title: Product on Ramos on Software
channel.description: Recent content in Product on Ramos on Software

item.title: The subtle art of saying no
item.description:
I’ve been wondering a lot about the importance of saying no recently:

  • Personally I’ve been trying to focus on important things and say no to other stuff that ends up consuming a lot of energy but is not that relevant.

  • Professionally as a Product Owner I got to say no a lot ! actually I think the art to say no is one of the most important characteristics of a good PO.
